About Project Catalysts

Overview

We are engineers who remove friction. Small team, clean interfaces, auditable results.

Approach

We design pipelines where the structure is explicit and transformations are testable. MIXT keeps data and docs consistent across outputs (web, PDF, DOCX).

Principles

  • Prefer less complexity
  • Model first; code follows
  • Determinism over magic
  • Performance with measurement
